titleStmt.title: By the king. A proclamation. Containing his Majesties gracious pardon and indemnity
Proclamations. 1679-07-27.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.

publicationStmt.publisher: Edinburgh, printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to his most sacred Majesty, anno Dom. 1679. And re-printed at London,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: the twenty-seventh day of July, one thousand, six hundred, seventy and nine. And of our reign, the threetieth-one [sic] year.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
